name: White_Reclining_Loveseat
description:
This plush, elegant, eye-catching recliner loveseat allows you to sink in
  to comfort after a long, tiring day. This recliner loveseat has a brilliant
  and inviting pure white tone, making it a perfect fit for virtually any room
  decor/ color scheme. Additional accents include deeply padded armrests along
  with waterfall-style seatbacks and seat cushions for a distinctive look and
  appeal. Quality craftsmanship in every detail ensures comfort and durability.
  Modern, dramatic and inviting, this striking recliner loveseat is a stunning
  showcase for any room in your home.
    Furniture Pattern: SolidType: Loveseat, ReclinerStyle: ContemporaryMaterial: PolyurethaneColor: WhiteAssembledDimensions: 64 inches long x 38 inches wide x 39 inches highStyleContemporaryMaterialPolyurethaneTypeLoveseat, ReclinerAssemblyAssembledColorWhiteFurniture PatternSolid
